thread.title: 2017 Independent Spirit Awards: The Complete Winners List
thread.title_full: 2017 Independent Spirit Awards: The Complete Winners List

author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: 2017 Independent Spirit Awards: The Complete Winners List
text: 2017 Independent Spirit Awards: The Complete Winners List by Jennifer Drysdale 3:19 PM PST, February 25, 2017 Photo: Getty Images The 32nd annual Independent Spirit Awards, sponsored by Perrier-Jouët, kicked off Saturday at the Santa Monica Pier in California, honoring the best independent films of 2016. Oscar contenders like Manchester by the Sea and Moonlight are both nominated for awards, alongside smaller films like American Honey and Chronic , making Saturday's awards ceremony truly anyone's game. Check back for updates to see who wins big. Best Feature
